TextBody:
Hello,

Thank you for reply.
This ticket, that you raised in 1st of August was regarding the matter below:

Currently I am using c5a.xlarge instance on AWS Cloud. and aws suggested that "Compute Optimizer found that this instance's CPU, EBS throughput, network bandwidth and network PPS are over-provisioned." May you suggest optimised instance type so that I can save cost without any issue?

To have a better overview of the ongoing issues and the one that are resolved, I will ask you to please raise a separate ticket for a different topic.
Can we then consider this ticket closed now?

Best regards,
Alin Anca
